attributes.action: To RETURN a dog from a Rescue to its Breeder/Owner.
attributes.additional_details:
Debbie Gamble wants her Dog back from Rain Rescue, after the person who bought it of her then bought him to England and dumped it on the street.
Debbie who has been in the breed for many years has offered to pay any expenses incurred to the rescue who currently REFUSE to hand the dog over.
This campaign is to show rescues that the breeder should always be consulted and this dog was Micro chipped as the same as the Government are brining in soon, what is the point doing this if rescues are ignoring this.
Sign this petition to get this dog back where he rightfully belongs.
